column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Delicious! I found this place on yelp and I love to try new places so I thought
column3: why not? I'm in town for work and
column6: but they have two bar areas that you can sit at and have a great experience! I suggest the back bar where you can watch the magic happen. I ordered the Premium Tonkotsu White and it was delicious: not too salty and wonderfully filling. I went at lunch time and things were bustling but I was seated right away. If I'm ever back in town
column7: I'll definitely be coming back for another solid lunch!
